name: 萤火之森
description:
名为小烨的少女从小就有着一个魔法梦，她梦想着用魔法来让一家人过上美好的生活。但在现实，面对已然支离破碎的家庭，无力为力的小烨陷于苦闷之中。发生在现实的伤心事，在小烨的梦中化身成了可怕的怪物，不断折磨着小烨。而玩家则需要帮助小烨，在梦世界中运用魔法的力量战胜心魔，确保小烨不受怪物的伤害，找到记忆碎片，并找到出口逃出梦世界。

The young girl named Xiao Ye has a dream of magic since she was young. She dreams of using magic to make her family live a better life. However, in reality, facing the already broken family, Xiao Ye, who is powerless, is trapped in depression. The sad thing that happens in reality turns into a terrible monster in Xiao Ye's dream, constantly tormenting Xiao Ye. Meanwhile, the player needs to help Xiao Ye to use the power of magic to defeat the demons in the dream world, so as to ensure that Xiao Ye will not be hurt by monsters, find memory fragments, and find an exit to escape from the dream world.
